lead_paragraph: The death is almost certain to add to pressure on the state and federal authorities to improve coordination among the patchwork of agencies responsible for law enforcement.

headline.print_headline: Suicide in Jail Puts Scrutiny on Officials in Germany
headline.main: Terrorism Suspect’s Suicide Adds to Scrutiny of German Security Services

snippet: The death is almost certain to add to pressure on the state and federal authorities to improve coordination among the patchwork of agencies responsible for law enforcement....
abstract: Suicide of Syrian refugee and terror suspect Jaber al-Bakr inside Leipzig, Germany, jail cell puts pressure on country's authorities to account for series of questionable decisions; Bakr's death deprived investigators of important source of intelligence on potential Islamic State operations in region.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
